author: Dee122582
title: Beautiful and charming!
text:
Hotel Ad√®le et Jules was charming, modern, and clean. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the staff were professional and friendly. The hotel is a block away from this delicious boulangerie. Really enjoyed my stay!
Room Tip: I would inquire about pricing for breakfast and certain items in the room before opening any package... See more room tips
